issue.title: [JS] Move io operations to arrow.io namespace
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-870](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-870). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Maybe create separate `arrow.io.file` and `arrow.io.stream` objects?

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-870?focusedCommentId=16209689) by Brian Hulette (bhulette):*
No longer relevant with the new js library.
